```{r message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
library(here)
library(lme4)
```

```{r}
aids <- read_csv(here::here("data/aids.csv"))
#aids <- read_csv("~/Documents/Stats-112-Final-Project/data/aids.csv")

aids %<>% 
  mutate(cd4 = as.integer(exp(log_cd4) - 1))

model <- glmer(cd4 ~ week + treatment:week + gender:treatment + age:treatment + (1 + week | id), 
               data = aids)
```
